GeminiSDR Documentation

Welcome to GeminiSDR, an advanced Software Defined Radio (SDR) system with machine learning capabilities for adaptive signal processing and adversarial jamming scenarios.

Quick Start

For quick installation and setup instructions, see our Getting Started.

Features

  • Cross-platform ML optimization (M1 Mac, Linux VM, CUDA)

  • Adaptive signal processing with reinforcement learning

  • Hardware abstraction for multiple SDR devices

  • Adversarial jamming and anti-jamming capabilities

  • Real-time signal analysis and visualization
